title: Renault Nissan Automotive utilises 85% of renewable energy at TN plant between July-December 2023
description: Renault-Nissan Automotive India Pvt Ltd for its target to become carbon neutral has rolled out a three pillared approach which include -- increasing the share of green energy, aggressively improving efficiencies in energy usage and continuous adoption of energy efficient technology at the facility.
